Sentencas: Cathode materials play a crucial role in enabling the widespread adoption of intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells (IT-SOFC) for commercial applications.
Titulo: Characterization of B-Site Sc-doped La2Ni1-xScxO4+δ (x=0, 0.05, 0.10, and 0.15) perovskites as cathode materials for IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: This study utilized the sol-gel method to prepare a range of perovskite oxides, specifically Sc-doped La2Ni1-xScxO4+delta (x = 0, 0.05, 0.10, and 0.15), without the use of cobalt.
Titulo: Characterization of B-Site Sc-doped La2Ni1-xScxO4+δ (x=0, 0.05, 0.10, and 0.15) perovskites as cathode materials for IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: The investigation focused on making a study of how the introduction of Sc doping affected the thermal stability, electrochemical properties, and structure of cathode materials.
Titulo: Characterization of B-Site Sc-doped La2Ni1-xScxO4+δ (x=0, 0.05, 0.10, and 0.15) perovskites as cathode materials for IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: XRD, FE-SEM, and electrochemical workstations were subjected to structural characterization and performance testing of materials.
Titulo: Characterization of B-Site Sc-doped La2Ni1-xScxO4+δ (x=0, 0.05, 0.10, and 0.15) perovskites as cathode materials for IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: The findings indicate that all the prepared materials have a typical Ruddlesden-Popper structure, and an abundance of additional oxygen can be generated in close proximity to the interstitial by incorporating Sc into the cathode of La2Ni1-xScxO4+delta to increase the oxygen vacancy and improve the catalytic activity of ORR. La2Ni0.9Sc0.1O4+delta has the highest oxygen surface exchange kinetics, the dissociative adsorption of oxygen is the rate-limiting step at the cathode.
Titulo: Characterization of B-Site Sc-doped La2Ni1-xScxO4+δ (x=0, 0.05, 0.10, and 0.15) perovskites as cathode materials for IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: At a temperature of 700 degrees C, the lowest polarization resistance of La2Ni0.9Sc0.1O4+delta is 0.1298 omega cm2, while the single cell with La2Ni0.9Sc0.1O4+delta
Titulo: Characterization of B-Site Sc-doped La2Ni1-xScxO4+δ (x=0, 0.05, 0.10, and 0.15) perovskites as cathode materials for IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: as the cathode achieves an impressive peak power density of 0.462 W cm-2, thus demonstrating exceptional long-term stability.
Titulo: Characterization of B-Site Sc-doped La2Ni1-xScxO4+δ (x=0, 0.05, 0.10, and 0.15) perovskites as cathode materials for IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: La2Ni0.9Sc0.1O4+delta is expected to be a potential highperformance IT-SOFC cathode material.
Titulo: Characterization of B-Site Sc-doped La2Ni1-xScxO4+δ (x=0, 0.05, 0.10, and 0.15) perovskites as cathode materials for IT-SOFCs
